[00:00.00]HOLIDAY (Explicit) - Lil Nas X
[00:01.57]Lyrics by：Montero Lamar Hill/Denzel Baptiste/David Biral/Brytavious Lakeith Chambers/Tyler Brooks/Jocelyn Donald
[00:03.15]Composed by：Montero Lamar Hill/Denzel Baptiste/David Biral/Brytavious Lakeith Chambers/Tyler Brooks/Jocelyn Donald
[00:04.73]T-T-Tay Keith Took it to ten
[00:06.26]Hey
[00:07.13]Ayy it's a holiday
[00:09.31]I got h*es on h*es and they outta control yeah
[00:13.31]Ayy it's another way
[00:15.63]All my n***as on go and I hope that you know it
[00:19.22]I can't even close my eyes
[00:21.92]And I don't know why guess I don't like surprises
[00:25.46]I can't even stay away from the game that I play
[00:29.78]They gon' know us today yeah
[00:32.24]Ayy can I pop s**t
[00:34.58]I might bottom on the low but I top s**t
[00:37.76]Switch the genre on you h*es do a rock hit
[00:40.72]I got the biggest d**n song f**k the charts sis
[00:43.84]I don't need 'em
[00:44.65]They wanna know if I be lastin'
[00:47.09]B***h even if I started floppin' that'd be fashion
[00:49.98]Poppin' up in movies ain't no Nasy b***h it's Ashton
[00:53.51]Hee hee I'm bad as Michael Jackson
[00:56.38]Dun dun dun
[00:57.54]Ayy it's a holiday
[00:59.82]I got h*es on h*es and they outta control yeah
[01:03.79]Ayy it's another way
[01:06.12]All my n***as on go and I hope that you know it
[01:09.72]I can't even close my eyes
[01:12.69]And I don't know why guess I don't like surprises
[01:16.04]I can't even stay away from the game that I play
[01:20.32]They gon' know us today yeah
[01:21.99]Man I snuck into the game came in on a horse
[01:24.90]I pulled the gimmick I admit it I got no remorse
[01:28.06]Nobody tried to let me in nobody opened doors
[01:31.22]I kicked them motherf**kers down they didn't have a choice
[01:34.21]Dun-dun-dun
[01:35.10]They tried to next me hey boy no blessy
[01:38.16]And you know I flex but my checks give 'em Vettes
[01:41.28]Ayy and I'm sexy they wanna s*x me
[01:44.85]Pop star but the rappers still respect me
[01:47.89]They wanna know if I be lastin'
[01:50.25]B***h even if I started floppin' that'd be fashion
[01:53.13]Poppin' up in movies ain't no Nasy b***h it's Ashton
[01:56.75]Hee hee I'm bad as Michael Jackson
[01:59.53]Dun dun dun
[02:00.72]Ayy it's a holiday
[02:03.06]I got h*es on h*es and they outta control yeah
[02:06.97]Ayy it's another way
[02:09.33]All my n***as on go and I hope that you know it
[02:12.84]I can't even close my eyes
[02:15.65]And I don't know why guess I don't like surprises
[02:19.21]I can't even stay away from the game that I play
[02:23.56]They gon' know us today yeah
[02:25.63]Tay Keith f**k these n***as up
[02:27.21]Daytrip took it to ten
[02:28.38]Hey
data.trans:
[ti:HOLIDAY (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Nas X]
[al:HOLIDAY (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.57]//
[00:03.15]//
[00:04.73]Tay Keith制作
[00:06.26]//
[00:07.13]这是完美假日
[00:09.31]我身边人头攒动 他们都失去理智
[00:13.31]另辟蹊径
[00:15.63]我的兄弟都忙碌不已 我希望你知道
[00:19.22]我甚至无法闭上双眼
[00:21.92]我不明白 我想我不喜欢惊喜
[00:25.46]我甚至无法放弃我玩弄的游戏
[00:29.78]今天 他们会认识我们
[00:32.24]我能否尽情放纵
[00:34.58]我也许对人百依百顺 但是我屹立巅峰
[00:37.76]转变风格 制作一首大热的摇滚单曲
[00:40.72]我有一首大受欢迎的歌 去他的排行榜
[00:43.84]我不需要
[00:44.65]他们想知道我能否火下去
[00:47.09]碧池 如果我人气下滑 这掀起轩然大波
[00:49.98]电影里有我的身影 这不是Nasy 碧池 这是Ashton
[00:53.51]我像 Michael Jackson一样无人能及
[00:56.38]大红大紫
[00:57.54]这是完美假日
[00:59.82]我身边人头攒动 他们都失去理智
[01:03.79]另辟蹊径
[01:06.12]我的兄弟都忙碌不已 我希望你知道

[01:16.04]我甚至无法放弃我玩弄的游戏
[01:20.32]今天 他们会认识我们
[01:21.99]哥们 我溜进这个圈子 骑着骏马驰骋
[01:24.90]我耍了一点花招 我得承认我一点也不后悔
[01:28.06]没有人想让我加入其中 没有人给我机会
[01:31.22]我把他们打得落花流水 他们别无选择
[01:34.21]//
[01:35.10]他们想要碾压我 小子 差点运气
[01:38.16]你知道我尽情炫耀 但是我的钞票可以给他们买克尔维特跑车
[01:41.28]我风流倜傥 大家主动对我投怀送抱
[01:44.85]流行歌星 但是说唱歌手依然尊重我
[01:47.89]他们想知道我能否火下去
[01:50.25]碧池 如果我人气下滑 这掀起轩然大波
[01:53.13]电影里有我的身影 这不是Nasy 碧池 这是Ashton
[01:56.75]我像 Michael Jackson一样无人能及
[01:59.53]大红大紫
[02:00.72]这是完美假日
